title: Static Analysis

android.permission.SEND_SMS.description: Allows application to send SMS messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.description: Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.dynamite.heaterrc.SMSreceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to no hardware resources.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "com_restore_warning" : "Usted va a restaurar los valores predeterminados. Por favor, confirme"
"com_SMSreceived" : "Risposta dal dispositivo con numero di telefono:"

"helptext" : "Avant que vous pouvez utiliser cet application, vous devriez saisir le numéro de téléphone mobile du chauffage dans l'onglet 'config'.
 Quand vous actionnez la touche de commande, un SMS sera envoyé à le numéro de téléphone du chauffage avec le texte pré-configuré.
 Utilisez l'onglet 'Timer' pour un lancement programmé."

"helptextGPS" : "Use esta pestaña para enviar un mensaje con el texto configurado al número de teléfono configurado.
 Una posible aplicación puede ser el GPS-Tracker, que utiliza mensajes de texto para transmitir la ubicación del GPS."
"com_SMSreceived" : "Respuesta del dispositivo con número de teléfono:"
"cfg_tvSMScost" : "Costo de un SMS para el calentador."
"cfg_tvtempcmd" : "Texte de commande pour demande de la température"
"com_restore_warning" : "You are going to restore the default values. Please confirm"

"helptextGPS" : "Use this tab to send a message with the configured text to the configured phone number.
 A possible application can be the GPS-Tracker which is using text messages for transmitting the GPS location."
"com_SMSsendwarning" : "Sta per essere inviato un SMS all'apparecchio remoto"
"com_restore_warning" : "Sie sind dabei die Standardeinstellungen wiederherzustellen. Bitte bestätigen"
"cfg_tvheatdurationcmd" : "Texte de commande pour durée de chauffage"
"prog_helpText" : "Elija 'Enviar inmediatamente' si desea enviar el mensaje completo de tiempo.  Elija 'Envío programado' si desea enviar el mensaje de inicio para la hora y el día programados."

"com_prepaidRecharge" : "El crédito prepago del calentador se ha agotado. Por favor, vuelva a cargar y actualice el valor en la pestaña de configuración.  Establezca el valor en cero para deshabilitar el mensaje."
"com_SMSsendwarning" : "Un SMS sera envoyé à votre chauffage autonome"
"com_smsCounterExceed" : "El contador de SMS es mayor que"
"com_restore_warning" : "State per ripristinare i valori standard. Confermare prego"
"com_SMSsending" : ": SMS has been sent as scheduled"

"helptext" : "Per poter utilizzare questa applicazione, è necessario inserire un numero cellulare valido nel tab 'Config'.
 Premendo i pulsanti di comando nel tab 'Home', verrà inviato un SMS con il testo preconfigurato al numero salvato.
 Per un avvio programmato usate il tab 'Timer'."
"com_cnfgErrTxt" : "Bitte geben Sie eine gültige Telefonnummer im Konfig-Tab ein"
"com_SMSreceived" : " Réponse de l'appareil avec numéro de téléphone:"

"prog_helpText" : "Choose "Send immediately" if you would like to send an SMS containing the start time to the remote device as soon as you press the "Send Start Time" button.
 Choose "Scheduled Sending" in case you would like to send the start SMS at a scheduled day and time."

"com_prepaidRecharge" : "Das Prepaid-Guthaben des Heizgerätes ist aufgebraucht. Bitte aufladen und Wert im Konfig-Tab aktualisieren.
 Wert auf null setzen um Meldung zu deaktivieren."
"cfg_tvtempcmd" : "Texto de mando para la solicitud de la temperatura"

"helptextGPS" : "Usate questo tab per inviare un SMS con il testo preconfigurato al numero salvato.
 Un possibile utilizzo è per la trasmissione della posizione attuale GPS tramite GPS-Tracker."

"prog_helpText" : "Choisissez 'Envoi immédiat' si vouz desirez envoyer le SMS contenant l'horaire aprez cliquez le bouton.
 Choisissez 'Envoi prévu' si vouz desirez envoyer le SMS de démarrage à le temps e le jour établi."

"helptext" : "Bevor Sie diese Applikation benutzen können, müssen Sie eine gültige Telefonnummer im Konfig-Tab eingeben.
 Bei betätigen der Befehlstasten, wird eine SMS mit dem vorkonfigurierten Text an die gespeicherte Telefonnummer gesendet.
 Benutzen Sie den Timer Tab für einen programmierten Start."
"cfg_tvstatuscmd" : "Texto de mando para consultar el estado"

"com_prepaidRecharge" : "Il credito prepagato del riscaldatore è stato esaurito. Si prega di ricaricare e aggiornare il valore nella scheda di configurazione.  Imposta il valore su zero per disabilitare il messaggio."

"helptext" : "Para utilizar esta aplicación, debe introducir un número válido de móvil en la pestaña 'Config'.
 Al pulsar los botones de control en la pestaña 'Home', se le enviará un SMS con el texto preconfigurado para este número.
 Para usar el inicio programada utilizar la pestaña 'Timer'."
"com_cnfgErrTxt" : "Inserire un numero valido nel tab di configurazione."
"dn_notificationText" : "Tap here to see the details. The SMS has been sent as scheduled."
"com_cnfgErrTxt" : "Introduzca un número válido en la pestaña de configuración."
"com_Restartwarning" : "Please restart the application to activate the changes"
"cfg_tvinstruction" : "Pulse el botón 'Memorizar' después de la modificación"
"com_SMSsendwarning" : "Es wird eine SMS an das Heizgerät geschickt"
"com_SMSsendwarning" : "Usted está a punto de enviar un SMS al dispositivo remoto"
"cfg_tvSMSfeedbackcmd" : "Texte de commande pour feed-back par SMS"
"cfg_tvSMScost" : "Costo di un SMS per il riscaldamento"

"helptextGPS" : "Utilisez cet onglet pour envoyé un SMS avec le texte pré-configuré à le numéro de téléphone sauvé.
 Une utilisation possible est la transmission de la position GPS actuelle en untilisant le GPS-Tracker."
"com_restore_warning" : "Les paramètres d'origine seront reconstitué. Confirmez s.v.p."
"com_cnfgErrTxt" : "S.v.p. saisiez un numéro de téléphone mobile valide dans l'onglet 'config'"
"cfg_tvSMScost" : "Price of an SMS for the remote device"

"prog_helpText" : "Scegliere 'Invio immediato' se si desidera inviare il messaggio completo d'orario.
 Scegliere 'Invio pianificato' se si desidera inviare il messaggio d'avvio per l'ora e il giorno pianificato."

"com_prepaidRecharge" : "Le crédit prépayé de votre chauffage autonome est appauvri. S'il vous plaît recharger et rafraîchir valeur dans l'onglet 'Config'. Définir la valeur à zéro pour désactiver le message."
"com_SMSsendwarning" : "An SMS is going to be sent to the remote device"

"com_prepaidRecharge" : "The prepaid credit of your remote device is used up. Please recharge and update the value in the config tab.
 Set the values to zero to disable this notification."

"helptextGPS" : "Benutzen Sie diesen Tab um eine SMS mit dem vorkonfigurierten Text an die gespeicherte Telefonnummer zu senden.
 Eine mögliche Anwendung könnte der GPS-Tracker sein, welches SMS für die Übermittlung der aktuellen GPS Position verwendet."
"com_reset_txt" : "El contador de SMS ha sido reiniciado."

"helptext" : "Before you can start to use this application, please enter a valid phone number in the Config tab.
 By pressing the command buttons in the Home tab, a message with the configured text is sent to the stored phone number.
 Use the Timer tab for a timed start request."
"cfg_tvphonenumber" : "Número de teléfono móvil de dispositivo remoto"
"cfg_tvinstruction" : "Cliquez sur le bouton d'enregistrement après les modifications"

"prog_helpText" : "Wählen sie "Sofort senden" wenn sie eine SMS inklusive der Startzeit senden möchten sobald sie die "Sende Startzeit" Taste drücken.
 Wählen sie "Zeitplanmässiges Senden" falls sie eine Start-SMS zur geplanten Zeit am geplanten Tag senden möchten."
"cfg_checknumbertext" : "The entered phone number is not valid"

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (com.dynamite.heaterrc.SMSreceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
warning.description:
Permission: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS [android:exported=true]
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (com.dynamite.heaterrc.BootReceiver) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Activity (com.dynamite.heaterrc.StandHeizungActivity) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.

info.title: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
info.description:
The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#logs

secure.title: This application has no privacy trackers
secure.description: This application does not include any user or device trackers. Unable to find trackers during static analysis.

hotspot.title: Found 3 critical permission(s)
hotspot.description:
Ensure that these permissions are required by the application.

android.permission.SEND_SMS (dangerous): send SMS messages - Allows application to send SMS messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS (dangerous): receive SMS - Allows application to receive and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor your messages or delete them without showing them to you.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE (dangerous): read phone state and identity - Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.
